name: sistema-estoque
description: Sistema de GestÃ£o de Estoque com Electron, Angular e Node.js

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.prod:web: concurrently "cd backend-spring && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments=--server.port=3000" "npm run serve:frontend"
scripts.dist: npm run build:prod && cd electron && npm run dist
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:prod && cd electron && npm run dist:win
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -s first "cd backend-spring && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments=--server.port=3000 --define spring.devtools.restart.enabled=false" "cd frontend && npm start" "node scripts/wait-and-start-electron.js"
scripts.dev:fast: concurrently "cd backend-spring && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments=--server.port=3000" "cd frontend && npm start" "cd electron && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:network: concurrently "cd backend-spring && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments=--server.port=3000" "cd frontend && npm run start:network" "node scripts/wait-and-start-electron.js"
scripts.dev:ip: concurrently "cd backend-spring && mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.arguments=--server.port=3000" "cd frontend && npm run start:ip" "node scripts/wait-and-start-electron.js"
scripts.dev:sequential: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron:delayed"
scripts.dev:electron:delayed: node -e "setTimeout(() => require('child_process').exec('cd electron && npm run dev'), 8000)"
